mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GasStation ( gs_code, gs_name, ra_code, gs_company, gs_diesel, gs_gasoline, gs_lpg ) VALUES ( #{gs_code}, #{gs_name}, #{ra_code}, #{ra_name}, #{gs_company}, #{gs_diesel}, #{gs_gasoline}, #{gs_lpg} )

insert.foreach: INTO GasStation ( gs_code, gs_name, ra_code, ra_name, gs_company, gs_diesel, gs_gasoline, gs_lpg ) VALUES ( #{item.gs_code}, #{item.gs_name}, #{item.ra_code}, #{item.ra_name}, #{item.gs_company}, #{item.gs_diesel}, #{item.gs_gasoline}, #{item.gs_lpg} )
